attributes.action: ascertain the genetic damage experiencedby the Countrie's children as a result of their parents participation in Britain's Nuclear Weapons Programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as recomended by the Parliamentary Enquiry held on the 15th & 16th October 2007

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ascertain the genetic damage experiencedby the Countrie's children as a result of their parents participation in Britain's Nuclear Weapons Programme."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18030


Prime Minister's Office
